Question.Subject: google chrome, internet explorer, or firefox?
Question.Content: so which web browser do you use? and why not the others?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I personally use firefox. I love the ability to use all the customizable addons and everything.
I don't use internet explorer, because its to simplistic in its look and feel, its not customizable for shit, and i just don't like to support microsoft more than i already do.
As for chrome, i can't say ive used it a whole lot, but its security is good, and has decent add-ons and everything, but it seems to have the simplicity related to IE.
Overall i like firefox layout customization, protection add-ons, and over look and layout!

Answer.Content: firefox cus it blocks viruses and some pop ups internet explorer is rubbish chrome annoys me

I personally use firefox. I love the ability to use all the customizable addons and everything.
I don't use internet explorer, because its to simplistic in its look and feel, its not customizable for shit, and i just don't like to support microsoft more than i already do.
As for chrome, i can't say ive used it a whole lot, but its security is good, and has decent add-ons and everything, but it seems to have the simplicity related to IE.
Overall i like firefox layout customization, protection add-ons, and over look and layout!
Firefox is most safe... it checks everything on viruses and trojans and it doesn't freeze all the time like explorer does.

I agree with the first answer. I use firefox. reasons: ¤ie is horrible, terribly slow, its full of holes and I don't like endorsing ms anymore than I have to. ¤ chrome is meant to be fast but for me it is slower than Firefox. I also don't like the theme it has, it looks boring and not like a traditional browser. That is why back in the day so many people went to Firefox - because it had a similar feel to ie. ¤opera is great on mobiles but takes over my pc on the windows application and is slightly annoying. ¤never tried safari. ¤konquorer was alright, but I don't use Linux anymore so I don't use it. ¤i've also made my own browser but its pretty crappy at the moment so I use Firefox.
